channel.title: How to i get all my players to get a automatic cache update?
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys added a couple of custom objects etc and wanted to know how i can add an automatic cache update for them so they dont have to go into the cache and remove etc etc
anyone?[/b]

item.title: How to i get all my players to get a automatic cache update?
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

just change the version in cachedownloader.java
